segments.text: Excuse me , could you do me a favor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are busy in preparing for the train.Would you please buy us some fruit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of fruit do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Apples and pears , one kilo for each af them , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , please give me $ 10 in advance . l Wil have them bought for you .
segments.speaker: S2
